issue.title: Splitwise App
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

**Features:**
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups, add expenses
- Split equally, view balances

**Tech:** Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js

**Pages:** Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Create project foundation with Next.js 14 setup, including package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, Google OAuth provider, better-sqlite3, shadcn/ui, Tailwind), tsconfig.json with strict mode, .gitignore for Next.js, and initialize basic project structure (app/ directory, components/, lib/, prisma/ for SQLite schema).
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system and database layer. Create NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider, design and implement SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, and balances using Prisma ORM. Build all database models, migrations, and seed data. Owns: lib/auth.ts, lib/prisma.ts, prisma/schema.prisma, app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts.

workers.task: Create Prisma schema with User, Group, Expense, and Balance models. Generate and run initial Prisma migration to create SQLite database tables. Create seed script with sample data.
Create Prisma client singleton instance and database utility functions for querying users, groups, expenses, and balances. Implement CRUD operations for all models.
Configure NextAuth.js with Google OAuth provider. Create auth configuration with session management, callbacks for user account linking, and Prisma adapter integration. Set up API route handler.

ems.task: Build core application logic and API routes. Implement group creation/management, expense creation with equal splitting logic, balance calculation algorithms, and all CRUD operations. Create RESTful API endpoints for groups and expenses. Owns: app/api/groups/, app/api/expenses/, lib/calculations.ts, lib/actions.ts for server actions.

workers.task: Create database schema and SQLite setup. Implement database initialization, table creation for groups, expenses, and users. Handle all database connection and migration logic.

Implement balance calculation algorithms and expense splitting logic. Create pure functions for calculating who owes whom, handling equal splits, and computing net balances. Also implement server actions for group operations.

Create all RESTful API routes for groups and expenses. Implement endpoints for CRUD operations on groups (create, read, update, delete, add members) and expenses (create, read, update, delete, list by group). Handle request validation and response formatting.

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages. Build landing page, login/logout flow, dashboard with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists and balance views. Integrate shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.) with Tailwind styling. Owns: app/page.tsx, app/login/page.tsx, app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, components/ui/, components/expense-form.tsx, components/balance-card.tsx.

workers.task: Create landing page and authentication flow. Build landing page with hero section and features, Google OAuth login page with NextAuth integration, and logout functionality. Files: app/page.tsx (landing), app/login/page.tsx (login page), app/auth/callback/route.ts (OAuth callback), app/auth/signout/route.ts (logout), app/layout.tsx (root layout with navigation).

Build dashboard and group management UI. Create dashboard page showing user's groups, group detail page with expense list and balance view, and group creation dialog. Uses shadcn Card, Button, Dialog components. Files: app/dashboard/page.tsx (dashboard), app/group/[id]/page.tsx (group detail), components/group-card.tsx (group preview card), components/group-create-dialog.tsx (create group modal), components/expense-list.tsx (expense list display).

Create expense form and balance display components. Build expense creation form with amount, description, payer selection, and date picker. Create balance card component showing who owes whom with visual indicators. Uses shadcn Input, Label, Select, DatePicker components. Files: components/expense-form.tsx (expense creation form), components/balance-card.tsx (balance display), components/expense-item.tsx (individual expense display), components/member-select.tsx (member selection dropdown).

analysisSummary: Build a complete expense-sharing application with Google OAuth authentication, group management, expense tracking, and balance calculations. Tech stack: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, SQLite database, and NextAuth.js.
